module.sqlWrap: SELECT rl.LiveId, rl.RoomId, rl.Title, rl.Description, rl.preview_img, rl.Created, rl.PreStartTime, rl.PreEndTime, rl.LiveStartTime, rl.LiveEndTime, rl.LastActivityTime, rl.ClassId, rl.ClassName, rl.Status, rl.GoldCoin, rl.ZCId, rl.YuYue_Image, rl.YuYue_Content, rl.YuYue_RateKeys, rl.YuYue_BrowseCount,rl.Id AS PeriodId,u.Name FROM Room_Lives rl INNER JOIN Users u ON rl.RoomId = u.RoomId WHERE rl.LiveId = @LiveId
